Efendi Nahi.verse 32:2: Shpallja e këtij Libri, për të cilin s’ka dyshim – është nga Zoti i gjithësisë,
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:3: e ata thonë: “Ai (Muhammedi) e ka trilluar atë! Jo, ajo është e Vërteta nga Zoti yt – për ta paralajmëruar popullin, të cilit, para teje nuk i ka ardhur kurrfarë paralajmëruesi, që të shkojë në rrugë të drejtë.
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:4: Perëndia është Ai që ka krijuar qiejt dhe Tokën dhe çdo gjë që gjendet në mes tyre, për gjashtë ditë (periudha kohore), dhe e ka mbizotëruar Gjithësinë (Arshin).
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:5: Ai i udhëheq të gjitha gjërat, prej qiellit deri në Tokë, e atëherë kthehen tek Ai në ditën, gjatësia e së cilës është një mijë vjet sipas llogaritjes suaj (në këtë Botë).
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:6: Ai është dijtës i gjërave të padukshme dhe të dukshme, i Plotëfuqishëm dhe Mëshirues,
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:7: i cili e ka bërë të mirë çdo gjë që ka krijuar dhe ka filluar krijimin e njeriut prej balte,
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:8: (e) pastaj, ka bërë që pasardhësit e tij të krijohen prej një rrjedhje të dobët të ujit (spermës),
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:9: pastaj, e ka krijuar atë (njeriun) dhe i ka dhënë gjallëri, me frymëzimin e Tij.
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:10: Dhe ata thonë: “E, vallë, pasi të humbasim nën tokë, përsëri do të ngjallemi?” Dhe ata, nuk besojnë se do të takohen me Zotin e tyre.
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:11: Thuaju: “Do t’jua merr shpirtin engjëlli i vdekjes, i cili është caktuar për ju, e pastaj do të ktheheni te Zoti juaj”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:12: E, sikur t’i shohësh mëkatarët se si para Zotit të tyre kokëulur thonë: “O Zoti ynë, pamë dhe dëgjuam, andaj, kthena që të punojmë vepra të mira! Na, me të vërtetë, me ngulmëri besojmë!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:13: E, sikur Ne të donim, do t’ia jepnim çdo personi udhëzimin e tij, por kjo është fjala Ime e vërtetë: “Me të vërtetë, do ta mbush xhehennemin me xhindë dhe njerëz bashkërisht!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:14: E, shijoni (dënimin), ngase e keni harruar takimin e kësaj dite.
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:15: Ajetet Tona i besojnë vetëm ata të cilët kur të këshillohen me to, bijnë në sexhde, dhe të cilët, e madhërojnë Zotin e tyre duke iu falenderuar Atij, dhe të cilët, nuk bëhen mendjemëdhenj.
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:16: Pjesët e trupit të tyre ngriten nga shtrati (për t’u falur); i luten Zotit të tyre duke druajtur dhe shpresuar, dhe japin (lëmoshë) nga ajo që u kemi dhënë Ne.
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:17: Askush nuk di se çfarë gëzime të fshehta janë për ta – shpërblimi për atë që kanë punuar.
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:18: Vallë! A është njësoj si besimtari si mëkatari? Jo, ata nuk janë të barabartë:
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:19: ata që kanë besuar dhe punuar vepra të mira, për ta janë kopshtet e xhennetit Meëva – të përgatitur për atë që kanë punuar;
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:20: e ata që kanë bërë keq, vendbanim i tyre është zjarri; sa herë që duan të dalin nga ai (zjarri), do të kthehen në të dhe do t’u thuhet: “Shijoni dënimin e zjarrit, të cilin e keni përgënjeshtruar!”
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:21: Dhe Ne, do të bëjmë që të shijojnë dënimin e kësaj jete para (atij) dënimit të madh, për t’u penduar ata.
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:22: Kush është zullumqar më i madh se ai, që është këshilluar me argumentet e Zotit të tij, e shmanget prej tyre? Na, me të vërtetë, do t’i dënojmë mëkatarët!
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:23: Na, madje, ia kemi dhënë Librin Musait, dhe mos dysho në takimin me të, dhe e kemi bërë atë (Librin) udhërrëfyes për bijtë e Israelit.
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:24: Na, prej tyre – kemi bërë udhëheqës, të cilët udhëzonin me urdhërat Tona, meqë ishin të durueshëm dhe besonin bindshëm në argumentet Tona.
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:25: Me të vërtetë, Zoti yt, do t’i gjykojë në mes tyre Ditën e Kijametit, për atë që e kundërshtuan njëri-tjetrin.
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:26: (Vallë)! A nuk u është e qartë atyre se sa popuj i kemi shkatërruar Ne para tyre; nëpër shtëpiat e të cilëve ecin? Me të vërtetë, në këto ka argumente, e ata nuk po dëgjojnë (këshillat).
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:27: Vallë! A nuk shohin ata, që Ne, me të vërtetë e dërgojmë ujin në tokën e shkretëruar, e me të – nxjerrim të lashtat, me të cilat ushqehen shtazët e tyre dhe ata vetë, e ata madje nuk po shohin?!
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:28: Dhe, ata thonë: “E, kur më fitorja (Dita e Kijametit), nëse thoni të vërtetën?”
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:29: Thuaju (o Muhammed!): “Ditën e gjykimit, nuk do t’u bëjë dobi mohuesve besimi i tyre, e as që do t’u jepet afat”.
Efendi Nahi.verse 32:30: Andaj, ti shmangu nga ata dhe prit, edhe ata, me të vërtetë, po presin! afat”.

null.verse 32:2: Kitabın (Qur'anın) aləmlərin Rəbbi tərəfindən nazil edilməsində heç bir şəkk-şübhə yoxdur!
null.verse 32:3: Yoxsa (müşriklər): "(Muhəmməd) onu özündən uydurmuşdur!" - deyirlər.
null.verse 32:4: Göyləri, yeri və onların arasındakıları altı gündə xəlq edən, sonra ərşi yaradıb hökmü altına alan (ərşdə bərqərar olan) Allahdır.
null.verse 32:5: O, göydən yerə qədər olan bütün işləri idarə edir.
null.verse 32:6: O, qeybi də, aşkarı da biləndir, yenilməz qüvvət sahibi, mərhəmət sahibidir!
null.verse 32:7: O, yaratdığı hər şeyi gözəl yaratdı, insanı (Adəmi) yaratmağa palçıqdan başladı.
null.verse 32:8: Sonra onun nəslini nütfədən - bir qətrə zəif (dəyərsiz) sudan əmələ gətirdi.
null.verse 32:9: Sonra onu düzəldib insan şəklinə saldı və ona öz ruhundan (özünün yaratdığı ruhdan) üfürdü (həyat verdi).
null.verse 32:10: (Axirətə inanmayanlar) dedilər: "Məgər biz torpağa qarışıb yox olandan sonra yenidənmi yaradılacağıq?" Bəli, onlar Rəbbi ilə qarşılaşacaqlarını (qiyamət günü dirilib haqq-hesab üçün Allahın hüzurunda duracaqlarını) inkar edən kəslərdir!
null.verse 32:11: (Ya Rəsulum!) De: "Sizə müvəkkil olan ölüm mələyi (Əzrail) canınızı alacaqdır.
null.verse 32:12: (Ya Rəsulum!) Kaş günahları öz Rəbbinin hüzurunda (günahlarından utanaraq) başlarını aşağı dikib: "Ey Rəbbimiz! (Dünyada yalan hesab etdiyimiz qiyaməti və onun əzabını) gördük, (peyğəmbərlərin doğru dediklərini, haqq olduqlarını Səndən) eşitdik.
null.verse 32:13: Əgər Biz istəsəydik, hər kəsi doğru yola salardıq (imana müvəffəq edərdik).
null.verse 32:14: (Kafirlər Cəhənnəmə girdikdə Allah onlara belə buyurar: ) "Bu günə yetişəcəyinizi unutduğunuza görə indi dadın (əzabı)! Biz də sizi unutduq.
null.verse 32:15: Bizim ayələrimizə ancaq ayələrimizlə öyüd-nəsihət olunduqları zaman səcdəyə qapananlar və təkəbbür göstərməyərək Rəbbini həmd-səna ilə təqdis edənlər iman gətirərlər.
null.verse 32:16: Onlar ibadət üçün yataqlarından qalxar (gecələr az yatar), qorxu və ümid içində (Allahın əzabından qorxaraq, mərhəmətinə ümid bəsləyərək) Rəbbinə dua edər və onlara verdiyimiz ruzilərdən (ehtiyacı olanlara) sərf edərlər.
null.verse 32:17: Etdikləri əməllərin mükafatı olaraq (Allah dərgahında) onlar (mö'minlər) üçün göz oxşayan (onları sevindirəcək) nə cür ne'mətlər gizlənib saxlandığını heç kəs bilməz!
null.verse 32:18: Məgər mö'min kimsə ilə (Allahın itaətindən çıxmış) fasiq eynidirmi?! Əlbəttə, onlar eyni ola bilməzlər!
null.verse 32:19: İman gətirib yaxşı işlər görənləri etdikləri əməllər müqabilində qonaq qalacaqları (sakin olacaqları) Mə'va cənnətləri gözləyir.
null.verse 32:20: Fasiqlərə gəldikdə isə, onların məskəni cəhənnəm odudur.
null.verse 32:21: Biz ən böyük əzabdan (axirət əzabından) əvvəl onlara mütləq dünya əzabından daddıracağıq.
null.verse 32:22: Rəbbinin ayələri ilə öyüd-nəsihət verildikdən sonra onlardan üz döndərən kəsdən daha zalım kim ola bilər?! Biz, şübhəsiz ki, onlardan intiqam alacağıq!
null.verse 32:23: Biz Musaya kitab (Tövrat) vermişdik.
null.verse 32:24: (Cətinliklərə) səbr etdikləri və ayələrimizə ürəkdən inandıqları üçün Biz onlardan (İsrail oğullarından) əmrimizlə (insanlara) haqq yolu göstərən rəhbərlər tə'yin etmişdik.
null.verse 32:25: (Ya Rəsulum!) Həqiqətən, sənin Rəbbin onların (mö'minlərlə kafirlərin) arasında qiyamət günü ixtilafda olduqları (dini) məsələlər barədə hökm verəcəkdir!
null.verse 32:26: Məgər onlar indi yurdlarında gəzib-dolaşdıqları özlərindən əvvəlki neçə-neçə nəsilləri (peyğəmbərlərini yalançı saydıqlarından ötrü) məhv etdiyimizi görmürlərmi? Həqiqətən, bunda (Məkkə müşrikləri üçün) ibrətlər vardır.
null.verse 32:27: Məgər görmürlərmi ki, Biz quru yerə su göndərib onunla heyvanlarının və özlərinin yedikləri əkinlər (bitkilər, meyvələr) yetişdiririk? Məgər (bütün bunları öz gözləri ilə) görmürlər?
null.verse 32:28: Onlar: "Əgər doğru danışanlardansınızsa, (bir xəbər verin görək) bu fəth (Məkkənin fəthi, Bədr vuruşu, yaxud qiyamət günü) nə vaxt olacaqdır? - deyə soruşarlar.
null.verse 32:29: (Ya Rəsulum!) De: "Fəth günü kafirlərlə (sonrakı) imanı heç bir fayda verməz və onlara (tövbə etmək üçün) möhlət də verilməz!"
null.verse 32:30: (Ya Rəsulum!) Artıq onlardan üz çevir və (Allahın onlara əzab verəcəyi günü) gözlə.

null.verse 32:2: Knjigu objavljuje, u to nema sumnje, Gospodar svjetova,
null.verse 32:3: a oni govore: "On je izmišlja!" Ne, ona je istina od Gospodara tvoga da opominješ narod kojemu prije tebe nije došao niko da ga opominje, da bi išao Pravim putem.
null.verse 32:4: Allah je nebesa i Zemlju i ono što je između njih u šest vremenskih razdoblja stvorio, a onda svemirom zagospodario; vi, osim Njega, ni zaštitnika ni posrednika nemate, pa zašto se ne urazumite?
null.verse 32:5: On upravlja svima, od neba do Zemlje, a onda se sve to Njemu vraća u danu koji, prema vašem računanju vremena, hiljadu godina traje.
null.verse 32:6: To je onaj koji zna i nevidljivi i vidljivi svijet, Silni i Milostivi,
null.verse 32:7: koji sve savršeno stvara, koji je prvog čovjeka stvorio od ilovače -
null.verse 32:8: a potomstvo njegovo stvara od kapi hude tekućine,
null.verse 32:9: zatim mu savršeno udove uobliči i život mu udahne - i On vam i sluh i vid i pameti daje - a kako vi malo zahvaljujete!
null.verse 32:10: Oni govore: "Zar ćemo, kad nestanemo pod zemljom, ponovo stvoreni biti?" Oni ne vjeruju da će pred Gospodara svoga izići.
null.verse 32:11: Reci: "Melek smrti, koji vam je za to određen, duše će vam uzeti, a poslije ćete se Gospodaru svome vratiti.
null.verse 32:12: A da ti je vidjeti grješnike kako će, oborenih glava pred Gospodarom svojim, reći: "Gospodaru naš, vidjeli smo i čuli smo, pa nas povrati da dobra djela činimo, mi, doista, čvrsto vjerujemo!"
null.verse 32:13: A kad bismo htjeli, svakog čovjeka bismo na Pravi put uputili, ali Ja sam već istinu rekao: "Napuniću, zaista, Džehennem džinima i ljudima zajedno!"
null.verse 32:14: Pa trpite zato što ste zaboravljali da ćete ovaj dan doživjeti - i Mi ćemo vas zaboraviti - i vječnu patnju trpite zbog onoga što ste radili.
null.verse 32:15: U Naše riječi vjeruju samo oni koji, kad se njima opomenu, licem na tle padaju, i koji Gospodara svoga veličaju i hvale i koji se ne ohole.
null.verse 32:16: Bokovi njihovi se postelja lišavaju i oni se Gospodaru svome iz straha i želje klanjaju, a dio onog što im Mi dajemo udjeljuju.
null.verse 32:17: I niko ne zna kakve ih, kao nagrada za ono što su činili, skrivene radosti čekaju.
null.verse 32:18: Zar da vjerniku bude isto kao grješniku? Ne, njima neće biti isto:
null.verse 32:19: one koji su vjerovali i dobra djela činili čekaju džennetske bašče u kojima će boraviti, kao nagrada za ono što su radili;
null.verse 32:20: a one koji nisu vjerovali čeka vatra u kojoj će prebivati; kad god pokušaju iz nje izići, biće u nju vraćeni i biće im rečeno: "Trpite kaznu u vatri koju ste poricali.
null.verse 32:21: I Mi ćemo učiniti da blažu kaznu iskuse, prije one najveće, ne bi li se pokajali.
null.verse 32:22: A ima li nepravednijeg od onoga koji, opomenut riječima Gospodara svoga, njima leđa okrene? Mi ćemo, zaista, kazniti zlikovce!
null.verse 32:23: Musau smo Mi Knjigu dali - ne sumnjaj nimalo u to da je on nije primio - i putokazom je sinovima Israilovim učinili.
null.verse 32:24: Između njih smo Mi vođe određivali i oni su, odazivajući se zapovijedi Našoj, na Pravi put upućivali, jer su strpljivi bili i u dokaze Naše čvrsto vjerovali.
null.verse 32:25: Gospodar tvoj će među njima na Sudnjem danu presuditi u onome oko čega su se razilazili.
null.verse 32:26: Zar ovima nije jasno koliko smo Mi prije njih naroda uništili, po čijim oni nastambama hodaju? To su, zaista, dokazi, pa zašto neće da čuju?
null.verse 32:27: Kako oni ne vide da Mi gonimo kišu u ogoljelu zemlju, i činimo da, uz pomoć njenu, niče rastinje kojim se hrani stoka njihova, a i oni sami - pa zašto neće da vide?!
null.verse 32:28: I oni govore: "Kad će već jednom ta pobjeda, ako istinu govorite?"
null.verse 32:29: Reci: "Na Sudnjem danu, kada nevjernicima neće nikako koristiti to što će tada vjerovati i kad im se nimalo vremena neće dati.
null.verse 32:30: Zato se ti okreni od njih i čekaj, i oni doista čekaju! dati.

null.verse 32:2: এ কিতাবের অবতরণ বিশ্বপালনকর্তার নিকট থেকে এতে কোন সন্দেহ নেই।
null.verse 32:3: তারা কি বলে, এটা সে মিথ্যা রচনা করেছে? বরং এটা আপনার পালনকর্তার তরফ থেকে সত্য, যাতে আপনি এমন এক সম্প্রদায়কে সতর্ক করেন, যাদের কাছে আপনার পূর্বে কোন সতর্ককারী আসেনি। সম্ভবতঃ এরা সুপথ প্রাপ্ত হবে।
null.verse 32:4: আল্লাহ যিনি নভোমন্ডল, ভুমন্ডল ও এতদুভয়ের মধ্যবর্তী সবকিছু ছয় দিনে সৃষ্টি করেছেন, অতঃপর তিনি আরশে বিরাজমান হয়েছেন। তিনি ব্যতীত তোমাদের কোন অভিভাবক ও সুপারিশকারী নেই। এরপরও কি তোমরা বুঝবে না?
null.verse 32:5: তিনি আকাশ থেকে পৃথিবী পর্যন্ত সমস্ত কর্ম পরিচালনা করেন, অতঃপর তা তাঁর কাছে পৌছবে এমন এক দিনে, যার পরিমাণ তোমাদের গণনায় হাজার বছরের সমান।
null.verse 32:6: তিনিই দৃশ্য ও অদৃশ্যের জ্ঞানী, পরাক্রমশালী, পরম দয়ালু,
null.verse 32:7: যিনি তাঁর প্রত্যেকটি সৃষ্টিকে সুন্দর করেছেন এবং কাদামাটি থেকে মানব সৃষ্টির সূচনা করেছেন।
null.verse 32:8: অতঃপর তিনি তার বংশধর সৃষ্টি করেন তুচ্ছ পানির নির্যাস থেকে।
null.verse 32:9: অতঃপর তিনি তাকে সুষম করেন, তাতে রূহ সঞ্চার করেন এবং তোমাদেরকে দেন কর্ণ, চক্ষু ও অন্তঃকরণ। তোমরা সামান্যই কৃতজ্ঞতা প্রকাশ কর।
null.verse 32:10: তারা বলে, আমরা মৃত্তিকায় মিশ্রিত হয়ে গেলেও পুনরায় নতুন করে সৃজিত হব কি? বরং তারা তাদের পালনকর্তার সাক্ষাতকে অস্বীকার করে।
null.verse 32:11: বলুন, তোমাদের প্রাণ হরণের দায়িত্বে নিয়োজিত ফেরেশতা তোমাদের প্রাণ হরণ করবে। অতঃপর তোমরা তোমাদের পালনকর্তার কাছে প্রত্যাবর্তিত হবে।
null.verse 32:12: যদি আপনি দেখতেন যখন অপরাধীরা তাদের পালনকর্তার সামনে নতশির হয়ে বলবে, হে আমাদের পালনকর্তা, আমরা দেখলাম ও শ্রবণ করলাম। এখন আমাদেরকে পাঠিয়ে দিন, আমরা সৎকর্ম করব। আমরা দৃঢ়বিশ্বাসী হয়ে গেছি।
null.verse 32:13: আমি ইচ্ছা করলে প্রত্যেককে সঠিক দিক নির্দেশ দিতাম; কিন্তু আমার এ উক্তি অবধারিত সত্য যে, আমি জিন ও মানব সকলকে দিয়ে অবশ্যই জাহান্নাম পূর্ণ করব।
null.verse 32:14: অতএব এ দিবসকে ভূলে যাওয়ার কারণে তোমরা মজা আস্বাদন কর। আমিও তোমাদেরকে ভুলে গেলাম। তোমরা তোমাদের কৃতকর্মের কারণে স্থায়ী আযাব ভোগ কর।
null.verse 32:15: কেবল তারাই আমার আয়াতসমূহের প্রতি ঈমান আনে, যারা আয়াতসমূহ দ্বারা উপদেশপ্রাপ্ত হয়ে সেজদায় লুটিয়ে পড়ে এবং অহংকারমুক্ত হয়ে তাদের পালনকর্তার সপ্রশংস পবিত্রতা বর্ণনা করে। [ Sajdah ]
null.verse 32:16: তাদের পার্শ্ব শয্যা থেকে আলাদা থাকে। তারা তাদের পালনকর্তাকে ডাকে ভয়ে ও আশায় এবং আমি তাদেরকে যে রিযিক দিয়েছি, তা থেকে ব্যয় করে।
null.verse 32:17: কেউ জানে না তার জন্যে কৃতকর্মের কি কি নয়ন-প্রীতিকর প্রতিদান লুক্কায়িত আছে।
null.verse 32:18: ঈমানদার ব্যক্তি কি অবাধ্যের অনুরূপ? তারা সমান নয়।
null.verse 32:19: যারা ঈমান আনে ও সৎকর্ম করে, তাদের জন্যে রয়েছে তাদের কৃতকর্মের আপ্যায়নস্বরূপ বসবাসের জান্নাত।
null.verse 32:20: পক্ষান্তরে যারা অবাধ্য হয়, তাদের ঠিকানা জাহান্নাম। যখনই তারা জাহান্নাম থেকে বের হতে চাইবে, তখনই তাদেরকে তথায় ফিরিয়ে দেয়া হবে এবং তাদেরকে বলা হবে, তোমরা জাহান্নামের যে আযাবকে মিথ্যা বলতে, তার স্বাদ আস্বাদন কর।
null.verse 32:21: গুরু শাস্তির পূর্বে আমি অবশ্যই তাদেরকে লঘু শাস্তি আস্বাদন করাব, যাতে তারা প্রত্যাবর্তন করে।
null.verse 32:22: যে ব্যক্তিকে তার পালনকর্তার আয়াতসমূহ দ্বারা উপদেশ দান করা হয়, অতঃপর সে তা থেকে মুখ ফিরিয়ে নেয়, তার চেয়ে যালেম আর কে? আমি অপরাধীদেরকে শাস্তি দেব।
null.verse 32:23: আমি মূসাকে কিতাব দিয়েছি, অতএব আপনি কোরআন প্রাপ্তির বিষয়ে কোন সন্দেহ করবেন না। আমি একে বনী ইসরাঈলের জন্যে পথ প্রদর্শক করেছিলাম।
null.verse 32:24: তারা সবর করত বিধায় আমি তাদের মধ্য থেকে নেতা মনোনীত করেছিলাম, যারা আমার আদেশে পথ প্রদর্শন করত। তারা আমার আয়াতসমূহে দৃঢ় বিশ্বাসী ছিল।
null.verse 32:25: তারা যে বিষয়ে মত বিরোধ করছে, আপনার পালনকর্তাই কেয়ামতের দিন সে বিষয়ে তাদের মধ্যে ফয়সালা দেবেন।
null.verse 32:26: এতে কি তাদের চোখ খোলেনি যে, আমি তাদের পূর্বে অনেক সম্প্রদায়কে ধ্বংস করেছি, যাদের বাড়ী-ঘরে এরা বিচরণ করে। অবশ্যই এতে নিদর্শনাবলী রয়েছে। তারা কি শোনে না?
null.verse 32:27: তারা কি লক্ষ্য করে না যে, আমি উষর ভূমিতে পানি প্রবাহিত করে শস্য উদগত করি, যা থেকে ভক্ষণ করে তাদের জন্তুরা এবং তারা কি দেখে না?
null.verse 32:28: তারা বলে তোমরা সত্যবাদী হলে বল; কবে হবে এই ফয়সালা?
null.verse 32:29: বলুন, ফয়সালার দিনে কাফেরদের ঈমান তাদের কোন কাজে আসবে না এবং তাদেরকে অবকাশ ও দেয়া হবে না।
null.verse 32:30: অতএব আপনি তাদের থেকে মুখ ফিরিয়ে নিন এবং অপেক্ষা করুন, তারাও অপেক্ষা করছে। না।

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:2: Низпославането на Книгата - без съмнение в нея - е от Господа на световете.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:4: казват: Той я е измислил! Не, тя е истината от твоя Господ, за да предупредиш народ, при който дотогава не е идвал друг предупредител, та да бъдат напътени.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:5: Аллах е, Който сътвори небесата и земята, и всичко между тях в шест дни.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:7: Той управлява делата от небето до земята, после те се въздигат към Него в един Ден, колкото хиляда години, според вашето броене.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:8: Той е Знаещия и скритото, и явното, Всемогъщия, Милосърдния,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:9: Който сътвори със съвършенство всяко нещо и начена сътворяването на човека от глина.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:10: После Той сътвори потомството му от капка нищожна вода.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:11: После го осъразмери и му вдъхна от Своя дух.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:12: И рекоха: Нима след като изчезнем в земята, наистина ще бъдем сътворени отново? Да, в срещата със своя Господ те не вярват.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:13: Кажи: Ще ви прибере душите Ангелът на смъртта, комуто сте възложени.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:14: Ако видиш как престъпниците свеждат глави пред своя Господ: Господи наш, видяхме и чухме! Върни ни, за да сторим праведни дела! Ние вече сме убедени.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:15: Ако пожелаехме, щяхме да дадем на всекиго неговото напътствие.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:16: Вкусете, защото забравихте срещата в този ваш Ден! Забравяме ви и Ние.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:17: Вярват в Нашите знамения само онези, които щом им се спомене за тях, падат, свеждайки чела до земята в суджуд и прославят с възхвала своя Господ, и не се възгордяват.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:18: И напускат постелите си, и със страх и копнеж зоват своя Господ, и от онова, което сме им дали, раздават.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:19: Никой не знае каква радост за окото е скрита за тях - въздаяние за онова, което са вършили.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:20: Нима онзи, който вярва, е като онзи, който е нечестивец? Не са равни те.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:21: Които вярват и вършат праведни дела, техни са Градините на обителта - гостоприемство за онова, което са вършили.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:22: А които са нечестивци, мястото им е Огънят.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:23: И им даваме да вкусят от най-близкото мъчение преди най-голямото мъчение, за да се покаят.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:24: И кой е по-голям угнетител от онзи, комуто се напомнят знаменията на неговия Господ, а после той се отвръща от тях? Отмъщаваме Ние на престъпниците.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:25: И дадохме на Муса Писанието: Не се съмнявай в срещата с Него! И го сторихме напътствие за синовете на Исраил.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:26: И когато бяха търпеливи, и в Нашите знамения се бяха убедили, сторихме от тях водители, напътващи според Нашата повеля.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:27: В Деня на възкресението твоят Господ ще отсъди между тях за онова, по което бяха в разногласие.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:28: И нима на неверниците не им бе посочено колко поколения преди тях погубихме?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:29: тези се движат в техните жилища.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:30: И нима не виждат, че Ние насочваме водата към сухата земя, и сторваме с нея да поникнат насаждения, от които ядат те и техният добитък.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:31: И казват: Кога ще бъде това отсъждане, ако говорите истината?
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:32: Кажи: За неверниците в Деня на отсъждането не ще е от полза, ако тогава повярват.
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 32:33: Отдръпни се от тях и чакай! И те ще чакат.

null.verse 32:2: （這）是從全世界的主降示的經典，其中毫無疑義。
null.verse 32:3: 他們說：「他捏造它嗎？」不然！它是從你的主降示的真理，以便你警告在你之前沒有任何警告者來臨過的一群民眾，以便他們遵循正道。
null.verse 32:4: 真主曾在六日內創造天地萬物，然後，升上寶座，除他外，你們沒有任何監護者和說情者。你們怎麼不記念呢？
null.verse 32:5: 他治理自天至地的事物，然後那事物在一日之內上升到他那裡，那一日的長度，是你們所計算的一千年。
null.verse 32:6: 那是全知幽明的、萬能的、至慈的主。
null.verse 32:7: 他精制他所創造的萬物，他最初用泥土創造人。
null.verse 32:8: 然後用賤水的精華創造他的子孫。
null.verse 32:9: 然後使他健全，並將他的精神吹在他的身體中，又為你們創造耳目心靈。你們很少感謝。
null.verse 32:10: 他們說：「我們消失在地下之後，難道我們必定重新受造嗎？」不然！他們不信將與他們的主相會。
null.verse 32:11: 你說：「奉命主管你們的生命的死神，將使你們死亡，然後你們將被召歸於你們的主。」
null.verse 32:12: 假若你得見犯罪者在他們的主那裡垂頭喪氣地說：「我們的主啊！我們已經看見了，聽見了，求你讓我們轉回去，我們將做善事，我們確是確信者。」假若你看見這種情狀……。
null.verse 32:13: 假若我意欲，必以向導賦予每個人，但從我發出的判詞已確定了，我必以精靈和人類一起填滿火獄。
null.verse 32:14: 你們嘗試吧！因為你們忘記今日的相會，我確已忘記你們了。你們因為自己的行為而嘗試永久的刑罰吧。
null.verse 32:15: 信仰我的蹟象的，只有那等人：別人以我的蹟象勸戒他們的時候，他們便俯伏叩頭並讚頌他們的那超絕萬物的主，他們不敢妄自尊大，※
null.verse 32:16: 他們肋不落床，他們以恐懼和希望的心情祈禱他們的主；他們分捨我所賜予他們的。
null.verse 32:17: 任何人都不知道已為他們貯藏了甚麼慰藉，以報酬他們的行為。
null.verse 32:18: 信道者與悖逆者一樣嗎？他們是不相等的。
null.verse 32:19: 至於信道而且行善者，將來得以樂園為歸宿，那是為了報酬他們的行為的。
null.verse 32:20: 至於悖逆者，他們的歸宿，只是火獄，每當他們要想逃出，都被攔回去。有聲音對他們說：「你們嘗試以前你們所否認的火刑吧！」
null.verse 32:21: 在最大的刑罰之前，我必使他們嘗試最近的刑罰，以便他們悔悟。
null.verse 32:22: 有人以主的蹟象勸戒他，而他不肯聽從，這樣的人，誰比他還不義呢？我必然要懲浩犯罪的人。
null.verse 32:23: 我確已把經典賞賜穆薩，所以你們對於接受經典，不要陷於猶豫中，我曾以那部經典為以色列後裔的向導。
null.verse 32:24: 我曾以他們中的一部分人為表率，當他們忍受艱難，確信我的蹟象的時候，奉我的命令去引導眾人。
null.verse 32:25: 復活日，你的主必定判決他們所爭論的是非。
null.verse 32:26: 道他們還不曉得嗎？在他們之前，我曾毀滅了許多世代，他們常常經過那些人的故鄉，在那裡確有許多蹟象。他們怎麼不聽從呢？
null.verse 32:27: 他們還不知道嗎？我把雨水趕到無草的地方，而借它生出他們的牲畜和他們自己所食的莊稼。難道他們看不見嗎？
null.verse 32:28: 他們說：「這種判決甚麼時候實現呢？如果你們是說實話的。」
null.verse 32:29: 你說：「不信道者，在判決日，雖信無益，並且不獲得寬待。」
null.verse 32:30: 你應當避開他們，你應當等待，他們必定是等待的。 你說：「不信道者，在判決日，雖信無益，並且不獲得寬待。」

null.verse 32:2: Seslání Písma tohoto - o němž pochyby není - od Pána lidstva veškerého pochází;
null.verse 32:3: oni však říkají: "Sám si to vymyslil!" Ó nikoliv, to pravda je od Pána tvého pocházející, abys varoval lid, k němuž nepřišel před tebou varovatel žádný - snad půjdou po správné cestě.
null.verse 32:4: Bůh je ten, jenž nebesa a zemi i vše, co je mezi nimi, v šesti dnech stvořil a pak na trůnu Svém se usadil.
null.verse 32:5: On rozkaz z nebe na zem usměrňuje a ten pak k Němu vystoupí v den, jehož délka - podle počítání vašeho - tisíc let činí.
null.verse 32:6: A tak tomu je - On zná nepoznatelné i všeobecně známé a On mocný je i slitovný;
null.verse 32:7: ten, jenž udělal překrásně každou věc jím stvořenou a člověka nejdříve z hlíny stvořil,
null.verse 32:8: pak potomstvo jeho z kapky vody nicotné učinil
null.verse 32:9: a potom jej vyrovnal a část ducha Svého v něj vdechl; a sluch, zrak i srdce všem vám dal - a přece jak málo jste vděční!
null.verse 32:10: A říkají: "A až zabloudíme kdesi v zemi, což vskutku budeme novým stvořením vzkříšeni?" A přece jen v setkání s Pánem svým nevěří!
null.verse 32:11: Rci: "Anděl smrti, jenž vás na starosti má, vás povolá a potom budete k Pánu svému navráceni!"
null.verse 32:12: Kdybys viděl, jak provinilci klopíce hlavy před Pánem svým volat budou: "Pane náš, viděli jsme a slyšeli jsme; vrať nás na zem a my zbožné skutky konat budeme, neboť nyní jsme o pravdě přesvědčeni.
null.verse 32:13: Kdybychom chtěli, dali bychom duši každé vedení správné, leč nechť uskuteční se slovo Mé: "Věru naplním peklo lidmi spolu s džiny!"
null.verse 32:14: Ochutnejte trestu za to, že jste zapomněli na setkání s tímto svým dnem; My také jsme na vás zapomněli, okuste tedy za skutky své trest nesmrtelný!
null.verse 32:15: Ve znamení Naše pak věří jedině ti, kdož při zmínce o nich na zem padají klaníce se a chválu Pána svého slaví, aniž jsou domýšliví.
null.verse 32:16: Boky jejich se lůžkům vyhýbají, neboť oni Pána svého z bázně i z touhy vzývají, a z toho, co jsme jim uštědřili, rozdávají.
null.verse 32:17: Žádná duše neví, co z radostí skryto je pro ně odměnou za skutky jejich.
null.verse 32:18: Cožpak je věřící roven tomu, kdo je hanebník? Ne, ti rovni si nebudou.
null.verse 32:19: Pro ty, kdož uvěřili a zbožné skutky konali, pro ty jsou určeny zahrady útulku jako příbytek za to, co činili,
null.verse 32:20: však těm, kdož nepravosti páchali, těm oheň bude útočištěm.
null.verse 32:21: A dáme jim okusit trestu bližšího kromě trestu většího - snad se z bludu svého navrátí.
null.verse 32:22: Kdo je nespravedlivější než ten, jenž - když připomínána jsou mu znamení Pána jeho - od nich se odvrátí? My věru se provinilým pomstíme.
null.verse 32:23: Věru jsme již dali Mojžíšovi Písmo - a nebuď na pochybách, že se s Nim setkáš - a stanovili jsme je pro dítka Izraele jako vedení
null.verse 32:24: a z nich pak učinili jsme vedoucí, aby podle rozkazu Našeho vedli za to, že byli neochvějní a o znameních Našich přesvědčeni.
null.verse 32:25: Pán tvůj vskutku pak rozsoudí mezi nimi v den zmrtvýchvstání to, o čem se v mínění rozcházejí.
null.verse 32:26: Což nebylo jim ukázáno, kolik před nimi jsme již zahubili pokolení, okolo jichž příbytků tak často procházejí? A věru jsou v tom znamení - což sluchu tomu nepopřejí?
null.verse 32:27: Což nepozorují, jak ženeme vodu na zem vyprahlou, takže z ní obilí vzrůstá, jímž živí se jak oni, tak i jejich stáda? Což jasně to nezří?
null.verse 32:28: A vyptávají se: "Kdy tedy přijde ono rozhodnutí, jste-li pravdomluvní?"
null.verse 32:29: Odpověz: "V den rozhodnutí nebude nic platna víra těm, kdož nevěřící byli, a nebude jim dán odklad žádný!"
null.verse 32:30: Odvrať se tedy od nich a vyčkávej! Však také oni čekají.

null.verse 32:2: De openbaring van het Boek is zonder twijfel van de Heer der Werelden.
null.verse 32:3: Zeggen zij: "Hij heeft het verzonnen?" Neen, het is de Waarheid van uw Heer, opdat gij een volk moogt waarschuwen onder hetwelk vóór u geen waarschuwer is geweest, opdat zij geleid mogen worden.
null.verse 32:4: God is het, Die de hemelen en de aarde en hetgeen er tussen is in zes dagen schiep; daarna zette Hij Zich op de Troon.
null.verse 32:5: Hij ordent het bestel van de hemel tot de aarde, daarna zal deze tot Hem opstijgen in een dag, waarvan de duur naar uw berekening duizend jaar is.
null.verse 32:6: Alzo is de Kenner van het onzichtbare en het zichtbare, de Almachtige, de Genadevolle,
null.verse 32:7: Die de schepping van alles voltooide.
null.verse 32:8: Daarna maakte Hij zijn nageslacht uit een uittreksel van een nietige vloeistof.
null.verse 32:9: Dan vormde Hij hem en ademde hem van Zijn geest in.
null.verse 32:10: En zij zeggen: "Zullen wij, wanneer wij in de aarde verloren zijn, opnieuw worden geschapen?" Neen, zij geloven niet in de ontmoeting met hun Heer.
null.verse 32:11: Zeg: "De doodsengel, aan wie gij toevertrouwd zijt, zal uw ziel nemen; dan zult gij tot uw Heer worden teruggebracht.
null.verse 32:12: O, kon gij het slechts zien wanneer de schuldigen hun hoofd zullen buigen voor hun Heer, zeggende: "Onze Heer, wij hebben gezien en wij hebben gehoord, zend ons nu terug opdat wij goede werken mogen verrichten; voorzeker wij zijn thans overtuigd.
null.verse 32:13: Indien Wij het wilden, zouden Wij aan elke ziel haar leiding kunnen geven, maar Mijn woord werd bewaarheid: "Ik zal de hel met djinn en mensen allen tezamen vullen.
null.verse 32:14: Ondergaat daarom (de straf) omdat gij de ontmoeting van deze Dag vergat.
null.verse 32:15: Slechts zij geloven in Onze tekenen, die, wanneer zij er aan herinnerd worden, zich met het gelaat ter aarde werpen en hun Heer verheerlijken met de lof die Hem toekomt, en die niet hoogmoedig zijn.
null.verse 32:16: Zij verwijderen zich van hun bed, hun Heer in vrees en hoop aanroepende en zij doen wel met hetgeen Wij hun hebben geschonken.
null.verse 32:17: Maar niemand weet welke verkwikking der ogen voor hen verborgen is gehouden als beloning voor wat zij hebben gedaan.
null.verse 32:18: Zou dan de gelovige gelijk zijn aan hem die ongehoorzaam is? Zij zijn (stellig) niet gelijk.
null.verse 32:19: Zij, dje geloven en goede werken doen, zullen Tuinen hebben tot verblijf, als onthaal voor hetgeen zij deden.
null.verse 32:20: Maar het tehuis v an de ongehoorzamen zal het Vuur zijn.
null.verse 32:21: Wij zullen hen inderdaad de lichtere straf doen ondergaan vóór de grotere straf opdat zij zich mogen bekeren.
null.verse 32:22: En wie is onrechtvaardiger dan hij die door het teken van zijn Heer wordt vermaand en zich er toch van afwendt? Wij zullen de schuldigen beslist straffen.
null.verse 32:23: Voorzeker, Wij gaven Mozes het Boek - twijfel dus niet aan de ontmoeting met Hem - en Wij maakten dit tot een richtsnoer voor de kinderen van Israël.
null.verse 32:24: En Wij stelden leiders uit hun midden aan, die het volk door Ons gebod leidden, zolang zij standvastig waren en in Onze woorden een hecht geloof hadden.
null.verse 32:25: Voorwaar, uw Heer zal op de Dag der Opstanding onder hen richten over hetgeen waaromtrent zij onderling verschillen.
null.verse 32:26: Komen zij niet tot inzicht (door het feit) dat Wij zovele geslachten vóór hen hebben vernietigd in wier woonplaatsen zij nu rondlopen? Daarin zijn zeker tekenen.
null.verse 32:27: Hebben zij niet gezien dat Wij het water naar het droge land voeren en daardoor oogsten voortbrengen waarvan zij en hun vee eten? Willen zij dan niet inzien?
null.verse 32:28: En zij (de ongelovigen) zeggen: "Wanneer zal deze beslissing plaats vinden als gij de waarheid spreekt?"
null.verse 32:29: Zeg: "Op de Dag der Beslissing zal het geloof der ongelovigen hen niet baten, noch zal hun uitstel worden verleend.
null.verse 32:30: Wend u daarom van hen af, en wacht; voorzeker zij wachten ook.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:2: The revelation of the Scripture whereof there is no doubt is from the Lord of the Worlds.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:3: Or say they: He hath invented it ? Nay, but it is the Truth from thy Lord, that thou mayst warn a folk to whom no warner came before thee, that haply they may walk aright.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:4: Allah it is Who created the heavens and the earth, and that which is between them, in six Days.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:5: He directeth the ordinance from the heaven unto the earth; then it ascendeth unto Him in a Day, whereof the measure is a thousand years of that ye reckon.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:6: Such is the Knower of the Invisible and the Visible, the Mighty, the Merciful,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:7: Who made all things good which He created, and He began the creation of man from clay;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:8: Then He made his seed from a draught of despised fluid;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:9: Then He fashioned him and breathed into him of His Spirit; and appointed for you hearing and sight and hearts.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:10: And they say: When we are lost in the earth, how can we then be re-created ? Nay but they are disbelievers in the meeting with their Lord.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:11: Say: The angel of death, who hath charge concerning you, will gather you, and afterward unto your Lord ye will be returned.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:12: Couldst thou but see when the guilty hang their heads before their Lord, (and say): Our Lord! We have now seen and heard, so send us back; we will do right, now we are sure.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:13: And if We had so willed, We could have given every soul its guidance, but the word from Me concerning evildoers took effect: that I will fill hell with the jinn and mankind together.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:14: So taste (the evil of your deeds).
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:15: Only those believe in Our revelations who, when they are reminded of them, fall down prostrate and hymn the praise of their Lord, and they are not scornful,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:16: Who forsake their beds to cry unto their Lord in fear and hope, and spend of that We have bestowed on them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:17: No soul knoweth what is kept hid for them of joy, as a reward for what they used to do.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:18: Is he who is a believer like unto him who is an evil-liver ? They are not alike.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:19: But as for those who believe and do good works, for them are the Gardens of Retreat - a welcome (in reward) for what they used to do.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:20: And as for those who do evil, their retreat is the Fire.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:21: And verily We make them taste the lower punishment before the greater, that haply they may return.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:22: And who doth greater wrong than he who is reminded of the revelations of his Lord, then turneth from them.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:23: We verily gave Moses the Scripture; so be not ye in doubt of his receiving it; and We appointed it a guidance for the Children of Israel.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:24: And when they became steadfast and believed firmly in Our revelations, We appointed from among them leaders who guided by Our command.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:25: Lo! thy Lord will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection concerning that wherein they used to differ.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:26: Is it not a guidance for them (to observe) how many generations We destroyed before them, amid whose dwelling places they do walk ? Lo! therein verily are portents! Will they not then heed ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:27: Have they not seen how We lead the water to the barren land and therewith bring forth crops whereof their cattle eat, and they themselves ? Will they not then see ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:28: And they say: When cometh this victory (of yours) if ye are truthful ?
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:29: Say (unto them): On the day of the victory the faith of those who disbelieve (and who then will believe) will not avail them, neither will they be reprieved.
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 32:30: So withdraw from them (O Muhammad), and await (the event).

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:2: (This is) the Revelation of the Book in which there is no doubt,- from the Lord of the Worlds.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:3: Or do they say, "He has forged it"? Nay, it is the Truth from thy Lord, that thou mayest admonish a people to whom no warner has come before thee: in order that they may receive guidance.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:4: It is God Who has created the heavens and the earth, and all between them, in six Days, and is firmly established on the Throne (of Authority): ye have none, besides Him, to protect or intercede (for you): will ye not then receive admonition?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:5: He rules (all) affairs from the heavens to the earth: in the end will (all affairs) go up to Him, on a Day, the space whereof will be (as) a thousand years of your reckoning.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:6: Such is He, the Knower of all things, hidden and open, the Exalted (in power), the Merciful;-
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:7: He Who has made everything which He has created most good: He began the creation of man with (nothing more than) clay,
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:8: And made his progeny from a quintessence of the nature of a fluid despised:
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:9: But He fashioned him in due proportion, and breathed into him something of His spirit.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:10: And they say: "What! when we lie, hidden and lost, in the earth, shall we indeed be in a Creation renewed? Nay, they deny the Meeting with their Lord.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:11: Say: "The Angel of Death, put in charge of you, will (duly) take your souls: then shall ye be brought back to your Lord.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:12: If only thou couldst see when the guilty ones will bend low their heads before their Lord, (saying:) "Our Lord! We have seen and we have heard: Now then send us back (to the world): we will work righteousness: for we do indeed (now) believe.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:13: If We had so willed, We could certainly have brought every soul its true guidance: but the Word from Me will come true, "I will fill Hell with Jinns and men all together.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:14: "Taste ye then - for ye forgot the Meeting of this Day of yours, and We too will forget you - taste ye the Penalty of Eternity for your (evil) deeds!"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:15: Only those believe in Our Signs, who, when they are recited to them, fall down in adoration, and celebrate the praises of their Lord, nor are they (ever) puffed up with pride.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:16: Their limbs do forsake their beds of sleep, the while they call on their Lord, in Fear and Hope: and they spend (in charity) out of the sustenance which We have bestowed on them.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:17: Now no person knows what delights of the eye are kept hidden (in reserve) for them - as a reward for their (good) deeds.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:18: Is then the man who believes no better than the man who is rebellious and wicked? Not equal are they.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:19: For those who believe and do righteous deeds are Gardens as hospitable homes, for their (good) deeds.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:20: As to those who are rebellious and wicked, their abode will be the Fire: every time they wish to get away therefrom, they will be forced thereinto, and it will be said to them: "Taste ye the Penalty of the Fire, the which ye were wont to reject as false.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:21: And indeed We will make them taste of the Penalty of this (life) prior to the supreme Penalty, in order that they may (repent and) return.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:22: And who does more wrong than one to whom are recited the Signs of his Lord, and who then turns away therefrom? Verily from those who transgress We shall exact (due) Retribution.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:23: We did indeed aforetime give the Book to Moses: be not then in doubt of its reaching (thee): and We made it a guide to the Children of Israel.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:24: And We appointed, from among them, leaders, giving guidance under Our command, so long as they persevered with patience and continued to have faith in Our Signs.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:25: Verily thy Lord will judge between them on the Day of Judgment, in the matters wherein they differ (among themselves)
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:26: Does it not teach them a lesson, how many generations We destroyed before them, in whose dwellings they (now) go to and fro? Verily in that are Signs: Do they not then listen?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:27: And do they not see that We do drive rain to parched soil (bare of herbage), and produce therewith crops, providing food for their cattle and themselves? Have they not the vision?
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:28: They say: "When will this decision be, if ye are telling the truth?"
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:29: Say: "On the Day of Decision, no profit will it be to Unbelievers if they (then) believe! nor will they be granted a respite.
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 32:30: So turn away from them, and wait: they too are waiting.

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:2: The sending down of the Book, wherein no doubt is, from the Lord of all Being.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:3: Or do they say, ’He has forged it’? Say: ’Not so; it is the truth from thy Lord that thou mayest warn a people to whom no warner came before thee, that haply so they may be guided.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:4: God is He that created the heavens and the earth, and what between them is, in six days, then seated Himself upon the Throne.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:5: He directs the affair from heaven to earth, then it goes up to Him in one day, whose measure is a thousand years of your counting.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:6: He is the knower of the Unseen and the Visible, the All-mighty, the All-compassionate,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:7: who has created all things well.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:8: then He fashioned his progeny of an extraction of mean water,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:9: then He shaped him, and breathed His spirit in him.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:10: They say, ’What, when we have gone astray in the earth, shall we indeed be in a new creation?’ Nay, but they disbelieve in the encounter with their Lord.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:11: Say: ’Death’s angel, who has been charged with you, shall gather you, then to your Lord you shall be returned.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:12: Ah, if thou couldst see the guilty hanging their heads before their Lord! ’Our Lord, we have seen and heard; now return us, that we may do righteousness, for we have sure faith.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:13: ’If We had so willed, We could have given every soul its guidance; but now My Word is realized -- " Assuredly I shall fill Gehenna with jinn and men all together.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:14: So now taste, for that you forgot the encounter of this your day! We indeed have forgotten you.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:15: Only those believe in Our signs who, when they are reminded of them, fall down prostrate and proclaim the praise of their Lord, not waxing proud.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:16: Their sides shun their couches as they call on their Lord in fear and hope; and they expend of that We have provided them.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:17: No soul knows what comfort is laid up for them secretly, as a recompense for that they were doing.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:18: What? Is he who has been a believer like unto him who has been ungodly? They are not equal.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:19: As for those who believe, and do deeds of righteousness, there await them the Gardens of the Refuge, in hospitality for that they were doing.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:20: But as for the ungodly, their refuge shall be the Fire; as often as they desire to come forth from it, they shall be restored into it, and it shall be said to them, ’Taste the chastisement of the Fire, which you cried lies to.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:21: And We shall surely let them taste the nearer chastisement, before the greater; haply so they will return.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:22: And who does greater evil than he who is reminded of the signs of his Lord, then turns away from them? We shall take vengeance upon the sinners.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:23: Indeed, We gave Moses the Book; so he not in doubt concerning the encounter with him; and We appointed it for a guidance to the Children of Israel.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:24: And We appointed from among them leaders guiding by Our command, when they endured patiently, and had sure faith in Our signs.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:25: Surely thy Lord will distinguish between them on the Resurrection Day, touching that whereon they were at variance.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:26: Is it not a guidance to them, how many generations We destroyed before them in whose dwelling-places they walk? Surely in that are signs; what, will they not hear?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:27: Have they not seen how We drive the water to the dry land and bring forth crops therewith whereof their cattle and themselves eat? What, will they not see?
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:28: They also say, ’When shall be this Victory, if you speak truly?’
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:29: Say: ’On the Day of Victory their faith shall not profit the unbelievers, nor shall they be respited.
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 32:30: So turn thou away from them, and wait; they too are waiting.

Muhammad Asad.verse 32:2: THE BESTOWAL from on high of this divine writ issues, beyond any doubt, from the Sustainer of all the worlds:
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:3: and yet, they [who are bent on denying the truth] assert, "
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:4: has invented it!" Nay, but it is the truth from thy Sustainer, enabling thee to warn
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:5: people to whom no warner has come before thee, so that they might follow the right path.
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:6: IT IS GOD who has created the heavens and the earth and all that is between them in six aeons, and is established on the throne of His almightiness.
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:7: He governs all that exists, from the celestial space to the earth; and in the end all shall ascend unto Him [for judgment] on a Day the length whereof will be
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:8: a thousand years of your reckoning.
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:9: Such is He who knows all that is beyond the reach of a created being’s perception, as well as all that can be witnessed by a creature’s senses or mind: the Almighty, the Dispenser of Grace,
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:10: who makes most excellent everything that He creates.
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:11: then He causes him to be begotten out of the essence of a humble fluid;
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:12: and then He forms him in accordance with what he is meant to be, and breathes into him of His spirit: and [thus, O men,] He endows you with hearing, and sight, and feelings as well as minds:
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:15: say, "What! After we have been [dead and] lost in the earth, shall we indeed be [restored to life] in a new act of creation?" Nay, but [by saying this] they deny the truth that they are destined to meet their Sustainer!
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:16: Say: "[One day,] the angel of death who has been given charge of you will gather you, and then unto your Sustainer you will be brought back.
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:17: If thou couldst but see [how it will be on Judgment Day,] when those who are lost in sin will hang their heads before their Sustainer,
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:19: we have seen, and we have heard! Return us, then, [to our earthly life] that we may do good deeds: for ,
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:20: behold, we are certain [of the truth]!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:21: Yet had We so willed, We could indeed have imposed Our guidance upon every human being: but [We have not willed it thus – and so] that word of Mine has come true: "Most certainly will I fill hell with invisible beings as well as with humans, all together!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:22: [And He will say unto the sinners:] "Taste, then, [the recompense] for your having been oblivious of the coming of this your Day [of Judgment] – for, verily, We are
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:24: abiding suffering for all [the evil] that you were wont to do!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:26: believe in Our messages who, whenever they are conveyed to them, fall down, prostrating themselves in adoration, and extol their Sustainer’s limitless glory and praise; and who are never filled with false pride;
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:28: who are impelled to rise from their beds [at night] to call out to their Sustainer in fear and hope; and who spend on others out of what We provide for them as sustenance.
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:29: And [as for all such believers,] no human being can imagine what blissful delights, as yet hidden, await them [in the life to come] as a reward for all that they did.
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:30: Is, then, he who [in his earthly life] was a believer to be compared with one who was iniquitous?
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:32: As for those who attain to faith and do righteous deeds – gardens of rest await them, as a welcome [from God], in result of what they did;
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:33: but as for those who are lost in iniquity – their goal is the fire: as oft as they will try to come out of it, they will be thrown back into it; and they will be told, "Taste
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:34: this suffering through fire which you were wont to call a lie!"
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:35: However, ere [We condemn them to] that supreme suffering, We shall most certainly let them taste of a suffering closer at hand, so that they might [repent and] mend their ways.
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:36: And who could be more wicked than he to whom his Sustainer’s messages are conveyed and who thereupon turns away from them? Verily, We shall inflict Our retribution on those who are
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:38: AND, INDEED, [O Muhammad,] We did vouchsafe revelation unto Moses [as well]: so be not in doubt of
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:39: having met with the same [truth in the revelation vouchsafed to thee].
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:41: We raised among them leaders who, so long as they bore themselves with patience and had sure faith in Our messages, guided [their people] in accordance with Our behest – [so, too, shall it be with the divine writ revealed unto thee, O Muhammad.
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:42: VERILY, it is your Sustainer alone who will decide between men on Resurrection Day with regard to all on which they were wont to differ.
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:44: can, then, they [who deny the truth] learn no lesson by recalling how many a generation We have destroyed before their time, –
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:45: in whose dwelling-places they [themselves now] walk about? In this, behold, there are messages indeed: will they not, then, listen?
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:46: Are they not aware that it is We who drive the rain onto dry land devoid of herbage, and thereby bring forth herbage of which their cattle and they themselves do eat? Can they not, then, see [the truth of resurrection]?
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:47: But they answer: "When will that final decision take place, if what you
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:49: Say: "On the Day of the Final Decision, their
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:50: faith will be of no use to those who [in their lifetime] were bent on denying the truth, nor will they be granted respite!" –
Muhammad Asad.verse 32:51: and then leave them alone, and wait [for the truth to unfold as] they, behold, are waiting.

Martin Lings.verse 32:1: Their sides shrink away form their beds, and they call upon their Lord in fear and in longing.
Martin Lings.verse 32:3: turn aside from their beds to invoke their Lord in fear and longing, and of what We have given them they give.
Martin Lings.verse 32:4: And no soul knoweth the hidden bliss that lieth in store for them as meed for that which they were wont to do.
Martin Lings.verse 32:5: soul knoweth what is secretly stored up for them of coolness of the eyes in reward for what they were wont to do.
